tech_news.title: Baldur's Gate 3 studio boss calls out "hurtful", "personal" videogame reviewers - "sometimes I think it'd be a good idea for critics to be scored, Metacritic-style" - Rock Paper Shotgun

tech_news.title: Windows 11’s ability to resume Android apps on your PC is getting closer - The Verge
